about_the_game:
Catapulted from your mundane reality into a realm facing apocalypse, you enter a world on the brink of destruction. Here, survival is paramount, requiring resourcefulness in gathering, building, and crafting amidst chaos. Your latent abilities are key, not just for survival, but for thriving and combating the darkness that hastens the world's end. This is an adventure of mastery and discovery in a land desperate for a savior to unveil its secrets and fend off the looming catastrophe.



  • 🧭 Explore a vast world of beauty - and darkness
  • 🏕️ Construct campsites, fortifications, and settlements
  • ⚒️ Gather and utilize resources to forge your path forward
  • 🗡️ Craft equipment and create custom weapons from pieces
  • 🛡️ Create your hero from scratch
  • 🧙 Master the art of sorcery by tapping into arcane energies
  • 🩸 Concoct potions to achieve a tactical upper hand
  • 🦞 Cook mouth-watering meals for extra vigor and other boons
  • 🧛‍♂️ Fight against the shadowy force menacing your new home
  • 🎣 Fish at the murky forgotten lakes of the world for a mysterious catch
  • 🐝 Catch a variety of critters for use in crafting or just for a collection







You find yourself lost in a fantastical realm with no way back. Learn the lay of the land and the rules governing this strange place. Once you know where and what to look for, you can harness nearly everything you find to help you become the champion of your wildest dreams. Outfit your chosen hero with bespoke weapons and mystic armor hammered out from the resources of this strange world. Choose between aesthetics that would bewitch even the nobles or practical efficiency that would impress a blacksmith - the choice lies in your hands!



Unleash your creativity with the Modular Weapons System: Combine blades and handles to craft unique weapons with the characteristics you desire.





Make a camp, build a perimeter, expand it, build a house, build a forge - create a new home! You'll venture further into the expansive world by building camp sites and larger outposts along the way. Having a well equipped base can make all the difference when facing the challenges of this new fantastic frontier.





After equipping yourself for the journey, a vast and enchanting universe awaits you. Delve into its abundant resources unearth hidden treasures, witness awe-inspiring wonders, brave treacherous perils, and unlock mysterious enigmas. Forge your domain by establishing camps, fortifications, and even prosperous settlements, expanding your influence across the realm.





In your new life you will also uncover your hidden skills in arcana - the sublime enchantment that breathes life into your newfound realm. The applications of arcana are many: Gathering, building, fighting, protecting and so on. It may be through magic that you finally find your way back home - should you so desire.





Beneath the tranquil facade, a sinister force is consuming the realm, spreading chaos, and driving the people into exile. Are you ready to steel yourself against the threat devouring these lands? It could be your destiny to steer this world clear of its impending doom...





You can conquer this strange new world alone - or you can bring a friend. Dysplaced allows you to bring along another dysplaced being for a shared experience in the dream-infused world where you will find both tranquility and excitement.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.8+ recommended
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2046 MB RAM
  • Graphics: SM 3.0+
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space

name: DYSPLACED

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: 64-bit
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: SM 4.0+
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Dysplaced is an open world fantasy survival game plunging you into a realm of myth and magic. Begin from scratch: gather resources, build camps, cook, and fish. Master magic, smithing, hunting, and alchemy to thrive. The way home weaves through darkness, brave it to find your way back! ⚔️🌙
